description: Anthony Joshua and Wladimir Klitschko are set to clash at Wembley Stadium on April 29 and you can win a montage photo frame signed by both parties to mark the big occasion.
title: COMPETITION: Win a signed Joshua and Klitschko photo
title_page: COMPETITION: Win a signed Joshua and Klitschko photo | Daily Mail Online
text:
ENTER THE COMPETITION To be in with a chance of winning a montage photo frame signed by Anthony Joshua and Wladimir Klitschko, CLICK HERE
Anthony Joshua and Wladimir Klitschko are set to clash in their hotly anticipated heavyweight title bout at Wembley Stadium on April 29.
The two giants are set to battle it out for the IBF title and vacant WBA belt in front of 90,000 fans in north London on Saturday in what is sure to be one of the fights of the year.
And Sportsmail, courtesy of Icons.com, are giving away a a montage photo frame signed by both stars to mark the big event.
Both stars have pedigree, with Joshua unbeaten in his 18 professional bouts.
Meanwhile, Klitshcko will be itching to get back in the ring having lost his heavyweight title fight to Tyson Fury last time out in November 2015.
To be in with a chance of picking up the unique prize, CLICK HERE.
